Minimum:

  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 with 6GB of memory / AMD Radeon RX 580 with 8GB of memory or graphics cards of a higher level.
